title: Stage Lv10-S39
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I'm sorry, but I think it might be difficult right now.
I appreciate the offer, but I'll pass this time.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 죄송하지만, 지금은 좀 어려울 것 같아요.
sentences.en: I'm sorry, but I think it might be difficult right now.
I appreciate the offer, but I'll pass this time.

sentences.kr: 좋은 제안이긴 한데, 시간을 좀 더 생각해볼게요.
sentences.en: It's a good proposal, but let me think about it a bit more.

sentences.kr: 마음은 굴뚝같지만, 현실적으로는 힘들 것 같아요.
sentences.en: I'd love to, but realistically it seems difficult.

sentences.kr: 정말 하고 싶은 마음은 있는데, 상황이 여의치 않네요.
sentences.en: I really want to do it, but the circumstances aren't favorable.

sentences.kr: 다른 때였다면 모르겠지만, 지금은 좀 그래요.
sentences.en: It might be different at another time, but right now it's a bit...

sentences.kr: 취지는 충분히 이해하지만, 제 입장도 있어서요.
sentences.en: I fully understand the intention, but I have my own situation too.

sentences.kr: 좋은 기회인 건 알지만, 이번엔 어려울 것 같아요.
sentences.en: I know it's a good opportunity, but this time might be difficult.
